config.hook_desc: The use of custom tables in bbcode

file.hooks_source:
<?php

class bbcodeTables
{
	public $registry;
	public function __construct()
	{
		$this->registry     =  ipsRegistry::instance();
        $this->settings     =& $this->registry->fetchSettings();
        $this->member       =  $this->registry->member();
        $this->memberData   =  $this->registry->member()->fetchMemberData();
        $this->lang         =  $this->registry->getClass('class_localization');
        $this->lang->loadLanguageFile(array('public_bbcodeTables'),'bbcodeTables');
	}

	public function getOutput()
	{

        if(!$this->settings['bbcodeTables_on'])
        {
            return false;
        }

        if(!in_array($this->memberData['member_group_id'], explode(",", $this->settings['bbcodeTables_groups'])))
        {
            return false;
        }

        if(!in_array($_GET['f'], explode(",", $this->settings['bbcodeTables_forums'])))
        {
            return false;
        }

        return $this->registry->output->getTemplate('bbcodeTables')->bbcode_main();
	}
}
